title: What is Jesmonite and Why is it Gaining Popularity in Contemporary Product
excerpt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=81hX8WAdNXs Jesmonite, a flexible substance crafted from a fusion of gypsum sourced from sedimentary rock and water-based acrylic resin, is gaining popularity among artists, eco-conscious enterprises, and DIY enthusiasts. This material emerged in the UK in 1984 and is credited to Peter Hawkins. Jesmonite is known for its durability, flame resistance, and impact resistance, is
